results.title: Differential Sex-Specific Effects of Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme Inhibition and Angiotensin Receptor Blocker Therapy on Arterial Function in Hypertension: CALIBREX Trial.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Despite equipotent antihypertensive effects, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ was more effective than @CHEMICAL_candesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C081643 @@@candesartan@@@ at lowering @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@arterial stiffness@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@.

citations.NLM: Rogers SC, Ko YA, Quyyumi AA, Hajjar I. Differential Sex-Specific Effects of Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme Inhibition and Angiotensin Receptor Blocker Therapy on Arterial Function in Hypertension: CALIBREX Trial. Hypertension. 2022 Oct;79(10):2316-2327. PMID: 35916128
citations.BibTeX: @article{35916128, title={Differential Sex-Specific Effects of Angiotensin-Converting Enzyme Inhibition and Angiotensin Receptor Blocker Therapy on Arterial Function in Hypertension: CALIBREX Trial.}, author={Rogers SC and Ko YA and Quyyumi AA and Hajjar I}, journal={Hypertension}, volume={79}, number={10}, pages={2316-2327}}

results.title: Effect of lisinopril and atenolol on aortic stiffness in patients on hemodialysis.
results.text_hl: It was hypothesized that, among @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ on hemodialysis, compared with a beta-blocker (@CHEMICAL_Atenolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@), a @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@-based therapy will better reduce @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@arterial stiffness@@@.

citations.NLM: Georgianos PI, Agarwal R. Effect of lisinopril and atenolol on aortic stiffness in patients on hemodialysis. Clin J Am Soc Nephrol. 2015 Apr 7;10(4):639-45. PMID: 25784174
citations.BibTeX: @article{25784174, title={Effect of lisinopril and atenolol on aortic stiffness in patients on hemodialysis.}, author={Georgianos PI and Agarwal R}, journal={Clin J Am Soc Nephrol}, volume={10}, number={4}, pages={639-45}}

results.title: [Effects of Amlodipine/Lisinopril Fixed-Dose Combination on Severity of Left Ventricular Hypertrophy and Parameters of Myocardial Stiffness in Patients With Hypertension].
results.text_hl: AIM: To assess effects of 12 weeks treatment with the @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ fixed-dose combination (ALFDC) on the left ventricular (LV) mass index (LVMI), parameters of LV and left @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@atrial stiffness@@@.

citations.NLM: Ostroumova OD, Kochetkov AI. [Effects of Amlodipine/Lisinopril Fixed-Dose Combination on Severity of Left Ventricular Hypertrophy and Parameters of Myocardial Stiffness in Patients With Hypertension]. Kardiologiia. 2016 Dec;56(11):27-37. PMID: 28290816
